titles.title: Insulin-Free World Medicare Pancreas Transplantation Coverage Act of 2001
To provide for coverage of all medically necessary pancreas transplantation procedures under the Medicare Program.

bill.summary: 4/3/2001--Introduced. Insulin-Free World Medicare Pancreas Transplantation Coverage Act of 2001 - Requires any medically necessary pancreas transplantation procedure to be a covered benefit under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, whether or not such procedure is done in conjunction with another organ transplantation procedure that is a covered Medicare benefit.
